name: Top View Perspective
description:
Get early access to build and test build, be able to try all epochs and test them by yourself on Patreon or contact me for support on Discord

To support me you can buy me a coffe or commission me at https://ko-fi.com/antonioriolo

Recommended settings:

  • Make sure you are aware on the usage instructions of LORA

  • Sampler: DPM++ SDE Karras (Recommended for best quality, you may try other samplers)

  • CFG Scale : 5 to 10

  • LORA weight for txt2img: reccomended 0.5-0.9.

  • Keys: top_view_perspective

My advice is to use the keyword with 1.3 weight and atleast 0.5 on the model.

Doesn't work with any other model, i tryied many, it worked with most of them, but with some of them didn't reach the expected perspective in the generated images.

It's very likely to get a selfie with this perspective since most of the training images are selfies.

Seems to work very well with anime.

Enjoy!

If you'd like to support my efforts and have access to early and bleeding edge builds, please think about joining my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/betterCuteAsians

meta.prompt:
<lora:betterCuteAsian03:0.3>, woman posing for a photo, (top_view_perspective:1.3),(wearing gym_outfit:1.3),
good hand,4k, high-res, masterpiece, best quality, head:1.3,((Hasselblad photography)), finely detailed skin, sharp focus, (cinematic lighting), collarbone, night, soft lighting, dynamic angle, [:(detailed face:1.2):0.2],(((5 stars hotel))), outside,  <lora:top_view_perspective-10:0.5>,   <lora:gym_outfit-10:0.5>
